channel.title: Upload help?
channel.description:
I'm really a newb at it. Can someone tell me how i can upload a folder unto a website.
It is required for the remote private server management thingy and i'm not sure how to do it.
Can someone plese explain to me how?
Thanks ;)

item.title: Upload help?
item.dc:creator: @Darky Darky
item.description:
@Darky wrote:

ftp://yoururl.com

or get smartftp client or something else use your webservers upload a file link (after you login to the administration section…

Read full topic
